channel.title: How do I make working menus?
channel.description: How please? Title says it all. :) I know I'm stupid asking this but I want to know how to create a Menu, the actual .txt document, because I don't know how to add any of those into my Source, and I would also like to know how to actually OPEN UP the menu with a command.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 10:28:49 AM[/size][hr]Edited.

item.title: How do I make working menus?
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You can do it the easy way.

Go into your client.
Hold ctrl and f.
Search for.

Mainhelpmenu

Until you come to the main help menu.
Then copy that and paste it below.
Then change the text.
Then link the command with the menu.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make working menus?
